jyzer.gui.guihelpers
Class RelatedClasses

java.lang.Object
  jyzer.gui.guihelpers.RelatedClasses

public class RelatedClasses
extends java.lang.Object

This is a container object that gahters releated classnames, and stores them. Stores only the classname, it truncates the package name if it is visible by default (it is in the java.lang package, or the class is in the same package where the classfile is).

Version:
1.0
Author:
Legendi Richard Oliver
